## ConeShape class


<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ConeShape extends Shape 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [arc](./decentraland-ecs.coneshape.arc.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Sets the ratio (max 1) to apply to the circumference to slice the cone. Defaults to 360. |
|  [openEnded](./decentraland-ecs.coneshape.openended.md) |  | <code>boolean</code> | Adds two extra faces per subdivision to enclose the cone around its height axis. Defaults to false. |
|  [radius](./decentraland-ecs.coneshape.radius.md) |  | <code>number &#124; null</code> | Sets the radius of the top and bottom caps at once.<!-- -->Properties <code>radiusTop</code> and <code>radiusBottom</code> are prioritized over this one. |
|  [radiusBottom](./decentraland-ecs.coneshape.radiusbottom.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The radius of the base of the cone. Defaults to 1. |
|  [radiusTop](./decentraland-ecs.coneshape.radiustop.md) |  | <code>number</code> | The radius of the top of a truncated cone. Defaults to 0. |
|  [segmentsHeight](./decentraland-ecs.coneshape.segmentsheight.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Sets the number of rings along the cone height (positive integer). Defaults to 1. |
|  [segmentsRadial](./decentraland-ecs.coneshape.segmentsradial.md) |  | <code>number</code> | Sets the number of cone sides (positive integer). Defaults to 36. |
